item.description:
Petit Robert is not having jazz music anymore, it would still be fun to have dinner there.  On March 30th they will be participating in restaurant week.  The menu has not been posted yet, but it will cost about $40 for a three course dinner (this includes tax and tip.) Beverages are not included, and the restaurant has an extensive list of French wines.  This special  menu is a great way to try the restaurant at an affordable price.  They will also have the regular menu available.

Here is the web site for more information about the restaurant: http://petitrobertbistro.com/

I have to limit the size of the reservation so please keep your RSVP updated if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under the name "Noelle."

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Restaurant Week at Petit Robert in Kenmore Sq
